title: Magdalena Cornejo
text:
Soy economista aplicada y profesora en la Universidad Torcuato Di Tella. Mis investigaciones se centran en métodos de predicción, econometría de series temporales y los impactos económicos del cambio climático.

title: Magdalena Cornejo
text:
I’m an applied economist and full-time professor at Universidad Torcuato Di Tella. I am also a Researcher at the National Council for Scientific and Technical Research of Argentina (CONICET). I hold a PhD in Economics from Universidad de Buenos Aires and an MA in Econometrics from Universidad Torcuato Di Tella.
My research interests lie at the intersection of forecasting, time series econometrics, and the economic impacts of climate change. More recently, I have focused on the interplay between natural resources and climate change, studying how extreme weather and climate shocks affect agricultural/energy markets, prices, and production outcomes.
Download CV

Course list here.



Full CV here.

title: Research
text:
You can find my full list of publications on Google Scholar.

The role of renewables in smoothing the impact of oil and gas price shocks on inflation: The LAC experience
Magdalena Cornejo, Michelle Hallack, David Matías. Resources Policy, 2025.
Are soybean yields getting a free ride from climate change? Evidence from Argentine time series
Hildegart Ahumada, Magdalena Cornejo. Econometrics, 2021.
Impact of Accelerators, as Education & Training Programs, on Female Entrepreneurs
Magdalena Cornejo, Carolina Dams, Ricardo Pasquini, Gabriela Robiolo, Virginia Sarria Allende. Entrepreneurship Research Journal, 2020.
Market power absent merger review: Brewing in Perú
Ariel Casarín, Magdalena Cornejo, María Eugenia Delfino. Review of Industrial Organization, 2019.
Out-of-sample testing price discovery in commodity markets: the case of soybeans
Hildegart Ahumada, Magdalena Cornejo. Agricultural Economics, 2016.
Explaining commodity prices by a cointegrated time series–cross section model
Hildegart Ahumada, Magdalena Cornejo. Empirical Economics, 2015.
Long-run effects of commodity prices on the real exchange rate: evidence from Argentina
Hildegart Ahumada, Magdalena Cornejo. Agricultural Economics, 2015.
Forecasting food prices: the case of corn, soybeans and wheat
Hildegart Ahumada, Magdalena Cornejo. International Journal of Forecasting, 2015.
